items.title: Minnesota shooting suspect found in field and crawled to police, ending manhunt
items.description: Vance Luther Boelter is accused of killing Democrat Melissa Hortman and her husband Mark, and injuring two others.

items.title: What we know about the attack on two Minnesota lawmakers
items.description: The attack on two Minnesota state lawmakers in their homes was described as politically motivated.

items.title: G7 is a big moment for Carney. Here are five things to watch
items.description: The gathering of leaders in Alberta will be a big test for Canada's new leader. We break down his challenges.

items.title: Gunmen storm Mexican village hall and shoot dead mayor
items.description: The mayor is the latest local official to be killed in an area of Mexico where organised crime holds sway.

items.title: The protesters and residents pushing back on tourism in Barcelona
items.description: Hostility towards tourists in Spain grows as locals complain of being forced out of their own cities.
